description.en:
Take me to the end of the world… said Blaise Cendrars.  
Come on, I'll take you, says Keiichi Koike.  
He takes you on a trip through time and space to the end of the world that is also but the beginning of it all…

description.fr: Après la chute de la troisième lune au centre de la ville, des personnes dotées de superpouvoirs sont apparues, que l'on a commencé à appeler des "phénomènes". C'est l'histoire d'une armée de résistance qui vit sur la lune et utilise ouvertement ses capacités, et des phénomènes du gouvernement qui protègent le bien des habitants de la ville en empêchant les attaques depuis la lune.

description.en:
The academy holds a chilling legend. 

"Neglect practice, become like ‘Luin Ardell."

Luin, the academy’s outcast, cursed with Mana Discharge Disability. But -

"You’re the chosen one, Draka’s harbinger of destruction."

After enduring ridicule for six years, finally, a new opportunity arises.

altTitles.en: This Kind of Thing is Fine

description.en:
Do what we want, when we want, with the person we want. Such a relationship needs no label.

Murata and Tomoka, who are tired of their past relationships, become friends after sharing a game online and decide to go directly to a love hotel. After this evening, they meet regularly and have a good time together.
description.ja: ノーモア彼女。グッバイ彼氏。束縛彼女にモラハラ彼氏、過去の恋人関係に辟易していた村田♂と友香♀は、オンラインゲームのオフ会で意気投合し、そのままラブホテルへ。一夜限りでもなく、付き合う訳でもなく、身体のみの関係でもない、ゆるくて気楽で、なおかつえっちぃ――自由な男女が織りなす大人の日常系、スタート。
description.ne: हामी जे चाहन्छौं, जब चाहन्छौं, आफूले चाहेको व्यक्तिसँग गर्छौ। यस्तो सम्बन्धलाई कुनै लेबल चाहिँदैन।

description.en: Minamoto-kun has a face pretty enough to make people think he's a girl. Because of his face, he was bullied by the girls in middle school who were jealous of his face. He developed a fear of women due to the trauma and ended up attending a high school for boys. Just as he enters college and makes a promise to himself to overcome the trauma of his past, his father remarries and asks him to move out of the house. His father arranges him to live with his aunt (Minamoto-kun's father's younger sister) for the time being. She is an extremely beautiful woman who is also a non-tenured professor at his college. When he arrives at her apartment, she shows him her breasts and tells him that he will be her "guinea pig" in her reverse Hikaru Genji project.
description.pt: Minamoto-kun tem um rosto bonito o suficiente para fazer as pessoas pensarem que ele é uma menina. Por causa de seu rosto, ele foi intimidado pelas meninas no ensino médio que estavam com ciúmes de seu rosto. Ele desenvolveu um medo de mulheres devido ao trauma e acabou frequentando uma escola para meninos. Justo quando ele entrar na faculdade e faz uma promessa a si mesmo de superar o trauma de seu passado, seu pai se casa novamente e pede para ele sair da casa. Seu pai arranja-lhe para viver com sua tia no momento. (irmã mais nova do pai do Minamoto-kun). Ela é uma mulher extremamente bonita, que também é professora adjunto em sua faculdade. Quando ele chega em seu apartamento, ela lhe mostra os seios e diz que ele será a sua "cobaia" em seu projeto Genji Hikari.
description.ru: Лицо Минамото-куна настолько прекрасно, что его легко спутать с девушкой. Из-за этого девушки в средней школе над ним часто издевались и дразнили. Тогда же он и получил серьёзную психологическую травму: боязнь представительниц противоположного пола. В результате всё закончилось переводом в школу для мальчиков. Сразу после поступления в колледж, он решает раз и навсегда избавится от детской травмы. Но тут его отец снова женится и просит сына съехать из дома и пожить с его младшей сестрой – тётей Минамото. Тётушка оказывается очаровательной женщиной, которая, к тому же, преподаёт в колледже Минамото-куна. Переехав к ней он узнаёт, что будет объектом её исследований. По мотивам классического японского романа «Повесть о Гэндзи».

altTitles.vi: Pháo đài của Sách Khải Huyền

altTitles.th: ผีดิบล้างโลก

description.en:
What can you do when you're mistakenly accused for murder? Nothing. You just go to prison. Lucky you; your inmates are some of the biggest cutthroats in the prison. Seriously, you are lucky. Especially when zombies attack.  
  
  
 [Official Thai](https://www.vibulkijshop.com/category/103/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99-action/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%8C-%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81)   
 [Official Korean](http://book.interpark.com/amway/product/BookDisplay.do?_method=detail&sc.shopNo=0000400000&sc.prdNo=255646966)

In ancient China a young fighter named Chinmi goes to the Dairin temple for advanced training. He eventually must leave Dairin temple to go on a pilgrimage where he meets many challenges to test his skills.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Kung Fu Boy** (1991: tankoubon, 2011: bunko)

---

- **Won the 11th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1987**
When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

title.en: Tetsujin No. 28 Kappa Comics Full Color version

altTitles.ja: 鉄人28号 カッパコミックス

description.en: The magazine-sized (B5 size) "Tetsujin 28-go", which was published by Kobunsha as "Kappa Comics" in 20 volumes around 1965, has been reprinted. The original 4 colors and 2 colors are faithfully reproduced.

Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

description.en: One day, Kaoru Uno suddenly starts seeing mysterious monsters known as shiryo or death spirits. With the arrival of his late father's coworker Yoji Amane and a special ring his father gave him, Kaoru is ushered into the world of necromancers! From the creator of Aliens Area comes a fantastic new series of necromancer battles!

description.cs:
Krásná Athanasia byla zabita rukou svého biologického otce, chladnokrevného císaře Clauda de Alger Obelia! Je to jen hloupá pohádka na dobrou noc... dokud se jedna žena neprobudí a náhle nezjistí, že se stala onou nešťastnou princeznou! Potřebuje plán, jak přežít svůj odsouzený osud, a čas se krátí. Bude se řídit plánem A, žít co nejtišeji, aniž by si jí všiml nechvalně proslulý císař? Plán B, shromáždit dostatek peněz na útěk z paláce? Nebo jí zůstane plán C, sladkými řečičkami se dostat do otcovy přízně?!

description.de:
Wiedergeboren in einer Welt voller magischer Kräfte und als Tochter des Kaisers! Besser hätte es Athanasia kaum treffen können. Wäre nicht der Kaiser ein grausamer Tyrann, der sein Kind ablehnt und vernachlässigt. Noch als Baby wird Athanasia bewusst, dass in ihrem neuen Leben etwas ganz und gar nicht stimmt! Wenn sie nicht eine Überlebensstrategie entwickelt, wird sie an ihrem 18. Geburtstag auf Geheiß ihres eigenen Vaters sterben. So weit darf es nicht kommen. Also macht sich Athanasia daran ihr Schicksal zu verändern...

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I had become a princess! But out of all the characters from this romance novel to be reborn into, why must it be the princess whose fate it is to die by the hands of her own blood-related father, the emperor?! If I want to live, I must never enter his sight. However…  

"Since when did this kind of scumbag start living in my castle?"

Without a single tear to shed nor a drop of blood to spill, that cruel and cold emperor, Claude! Will I, the Princess Athanasia who was caught by him, survive?

"I… What should I do…"

---
The beautiful Athanasia was killed at the hands of her own biological father, Claude de Alger Obelia, the cold-blooded emperor! It’s just a silly bedtime story… until one woman wakes up to suddenly find she’s become that unfortunate princess! She needs a plan to survive her doomed fate, and time is running out. 

Will she go with Plan A, live as quietly as possible without being noticed by the infamous emperor? Plan B, collect enough money to escape the palace? Or will she be stuck with Plan C, sweet-talking her way into her father’s good graces?!

description.fa:
آتاناسیا‌ی زیبا در سن ۱۸ سالگی به دست پدر خودش به قتل میرسه، کلود دِ الگر اوبلیا، یه امپراطور بی احساس! این فقط ی داستان شب بچگونس... تا اینکه دختره از خواب بیدار شد و فهمید به یه شاهزاده بدبخت تبدیل شده! اون برای زنده موندن از دست سرنوشتش به نقشه نیاز داشت، و یکمم زمان برای فرار. بنظرتون اون میتونه با نقشه A راحت زندگی کنه بدون اینکه مورد توجه امپراطور قرار بگیره؟ یا نقشه B، که میخواد پول کافی جمع کنه و بعدش بزنه به چاک؟ یاعم نقشه C؟ با شیرین زبونی و کاوایی بودن خودشو تو دل پدرش جا کنه؟!

description.fr:
Areu Areu, je dois sauver ma vie! Quand cette femme se réveille dans le corps d'une princesse, elle comprend vite qu’elle n’est pas devenu n’importe qui. Elle est Athanasia, célèbre héroïne de roman, qui meurt à 18 ans entre les mains de son impitoyable père, l'Empereur Obelia (Claude, pour les intimes). Elle n'a donc que quelques années devant elle pour changer le cours du destin. Evidemment, le plus simple serait de réussir à amadouer ce père qui la déteste. A moins de s'enfuir? Bon, pour cela il faudra déjà marcher plus vite qu'à quatre pattes!!

description.id:
Athanasia yang cantik terbunuh di tangan ayah kandungnya sendiri, Claude de Alger Obelia, kaisar berdarah dingin! Itu hanya cerita pengantar tidur yang konyol ... sampai seorang wanita bangun dan tiba-tiba menemukan dia menjadi putri yang malang itu! Dia membutuhkan rencana untuk bertahan dari nasibnya yang terkutuk, dan waktu hampir habis. Akankah dia pergi dengan Rencana A, hidup setenang mungkin tanpa diketahui oleh kaisar yang terkenal itu? Rencana B, kumpulkan cukup uang untuk kabur dari istana? Atau akankah dia terjebak dengan Rencana C, berbicara manis tentang kebaikan ayahnya?!

description.it:
La bella Athanasia fu uccisa per mano del suo stesso padre biologico, Claude de Alger Obelia, l'imperatore a sangue freddo! E' solo una sciocca storia della buonanotte... Fino a quando una donna si sveglia e scopre all'improvviso di essere diventata quella sfortunata principessa! Ha bisogno di un piano per sopravvivere al suo destino condannato, e il tempo sta per scadere. Sarà lei andare con il piano. A, vivere il più silenziosamente possibile senza essere notato dal famigerato imperatore? Piano B, raccogliere abbastanza soldi per sfuggire al palazzo? O lei sarà bloccata con il piano. C, parlare dolcemente percorrendo la strada per aggraziarsi il padre?

description.ja:
目を覚ましたらとあるネット小説の脇役姫、「アタナシア」というお姫様に転生していた。
しかし、アタナシアは父親の皇帝・クロードに見捨てられた姫で、周囲にも冷たく扱われている。
小説の中では、妹で主人公姫のジェニットに毒を盛った濡れ衣を着せられ、
１８歳の誕生日にクロードに殺されてしまう運命のアタナシア。
なんとしても死亡エンドを回避するため、お城を出る準備をこっそり進めていたアタナシアは、
ある日クロードの住む宮に入ってしまい――？

description.ko:
어느 날 눈을 떠보니 공주님이 되었다!

금수저를 입에 물고 태어난 건 좋은데,
하필이면 친아버지의 손에 죽는 비운의 공주라니!

피도 눈물도 없는 냉혈한 황제 클로드!
죽고 싶지 않다면 그의 눈에 띄어서는 안 된다.
그런데,

“언제부터 내 성에 이런 버러지가 살았지?”

황제의 눈에 띄어버린 아타나시아.
과연 그녀는 살아남을 수 있을까?

“나…… 어떡하지……?”

description.pl:
Piękna Athanasia została zabita przez własnego biologicznego ojca, Claude de Alger Obelia, zimnokrwistego władcę! To zwykła, głupiutka historia do łóżka... do czasu, aż pewna kobieta budzi się i odkrywa, iż jest tą nieszczęsną księżniczką! Potrzebuje planu, by przetrwać w wskazanej przyszłości, gdy czas ucieka. Pójdzie w ślady Planu A, żyć tak cicho jak to jest możliwe bez zauważenia przez niesławnego władcę? Plan B, zebrać wystarczająco pieniędzy żeby uciec z pałacu? Lub może utknie w Planie C, by słodką gadką wkupić się w łaski swego ojca?!

description.ru:
Когда я открыла глаза, то стала принцессой. Но почему из всех персонажей этой истории именно принцессой, судьба которой тесно переплетена с кровавым Императором? Если я хочу выжить, то должна быть неприметной для его глаз. «Когда это в моём дворце начали жить ничтожные людишки?». Человек, у которого нет ни капли сочувствия, ни слезинки — этот холодный император Клод! Неужели Атанасия, пойманная императором, сможет выжить? «Что… Что мне делать?..»

description.uk:
Прекрасна Атанасія загинула від рук власного батька, холоднокровного імператора Клода де Альджео Обелія. Це була просто дурнувата історія, щоб почитати перед сном… поки одна жінка не прокинулась у тілі той бідолашної принцеси! Їй потрібен план, щоб уникнути лихої долі, а час уже спливає. Чи слідуватиме вона плану А, і житиме тихо, не привертаючи уваги сумнозвісного імператора? Чи обере план B: зібрати побільше грошей і втекти з палацу? Чи застрягне на плані C, солодкими словами, добиваючись батьківської турботи.

title.en: A Cool Older Lady Who Drives Me Crazy

altTitles.en: A Cool Older Lady That Makes Me Crazy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mulher mais velha legal que me deixa louco

altTitles.es-la: Una mujer mayor genial que me vuelve loco

description.en: Hatsune Miku's one-panel manga series

altTitles.ja: 夢見るメイドのティータイム

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Fuyuka Yukinoshita starts working part-time at a maid cafe. She dreams of becoming someone who can make people smile, like the manager she admired, but she is always getting flustered by her idiosyncratic co-workers!

It is the magic that makes you smile. A fluffy and sweet moment.
description.es:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.
description.ja:
高校二年の春。メイド喫茶でアルバイトを始めた雪ノ下冬花。
憧れの店長のように誰かを笑顔にできる人になりたいという夢を抱くが、個性的な同僚たちに振り回されて!?
それはあなたを笑顔にする魔法☆ ふわふわで甘々なひと時を♪
description.es-la:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: A maker of individually crafted shoes returns home from a trip to Florence, Italy. One day, a surprise visitor comes to his studio…

title.en: Osanajimi no Koukousei no Aida ni Nikutai Kankei wa Seiritsu suru ka.

altTitles.ja: 幼なじみの高校生のあいだに肉体関係は成立するか。

altTitles.es-la: ¿Se puede establecer una relación física entre amigos de la infancia y estudiantes de preparatoria?

altTitles.en: Are Physical Relationship Possible Between Childhood Friends of High School Students?

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi no kōkōsei no aida ni nikutai kankei wa seiritsu suru ka

description.es-la:
Del autor de "Hirasaka Hinako es eróticamente linda", un trabajo completamente nuevo de Konya Yunkio.

La inocente Yuka Ota, la sexualmente curiosa Kasumi Niiyama, el evasivo Kosei Horie y el enamoradizo Ryuhei Onosaka. Los cuatro chicos y chicas de preparatoria, que han crecido como una familia, reciben en herencia una casa de una anciana, Hasebe Haru, valorada en cuatro millones de yenes y un plazo fijo. Bajo el mismo techo, se desarrollan el amor y la amistad excéntricos de estudiantes de preparatoria. Una historia juvenil ligeramente erótica.

description.en:
Would you sacrifice your honor to marry a Duke?

In order to save her family from ruin, Chloe Verdier must find a groom for her sister, Alice. 

She soon runs into the handsome but arrogant Duke Thisse who makes a proposal that could save them.

When Alice flees with a mysterious man, Chloe must seek out the Duke in the biggest gamble of her life.

Seeing it brings misfortune; defiling it brings a curse? Introducing a new era of strangeness, abandoning seriousness!

On a stormy day, a landslide destroys a fence, and siblings who ventured into a long-prohibited area encounter a terrifyingly bizarre creature...
"I'm a curse god, you know!? Don't you think anything of this grotesque form?!?"
The unflappable siblings, rather than being scared, casually call the creature "Dara-San" and grow fond of it!?

Seemingly scary but not at all! A new era of occult comedy that leaves seriousness behind.
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/darasan_PR)
description.es:
Verlo trae desgracia; profanarlo, trae una maldición... Introduciendo una nueva era de extrañeza, ¡abandonando la seriedad!

En un día de tormenta, un desprendimiento de tierra destruye una cerca, y unos hermanos que se aventuraron en una zona prohibida durante mucho tiempo se encuentran con una criatura terroríficamente extraña...
"¡Soy un dios maldito! ¡¿No te importa nada esta forma grotesca?!?"
Los imperturbables hermanos, en lugar de asustarse, llaman casualmente a la criatura "Dara-San" y ¡le cogen cariño!?

Parece que da miedo, ¡pero no! Una nueva era de comedia ocultista que deja atrás la seriedad.

description.en: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.

title.en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-

altTitles.es: Templo - Nadie puede vivir en soledad

altTitles.de: TenPuru: Von Einsamkeit kann man nicht leben

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

altTitles.ja: スパイ ファミリー

description.ar: أمضى الجاسوس الخبير المسمى <الشفق> أيامه في مهام سرية ، وكل ذلك من أجل تحقيق عالم أفضل. لكن في يوم من الأيام ، حصل على أمر جديد صعب للغاية من القيادة. من أجل مهمته ، يجب عليه تكوين أسرة مؤقتة وبدء حياة جديدة؟!
description.en:
The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?! 

A Spy/Action/Comedy manga about a one-of-a-kind family!
description.es: El hábil espía Tasogare se dedicaba diariamente a cumplir misiones especiales por un mundo mejor. Un día recibe un complicado desafío... Su deber es crear una familia falsa y comenzar una nueva vida para poder cumplir la misión, ¿¡pero...!? ¡¡Un Espía × Acción × Comedia de una familia peculiarl!!
description.id: “Twilight,” seorang mata-mata yang hebat, setiap hari menjalankan misi rahasia untuk menciptakan dunia yang lebih baik. Suatu hari, dia mendapatkan perintah baru yang sangat sulit. Demi misi itu, dia harus memiliki keluarga sementara dan memulai hidup baru sebagai seorang ayah! Mata-mata x Aksi x Komedi keluarga istimewa!
description.it: Twilight, una delle migliori spie al mondo, ha trascorso la vita ad affrontare missioni sotto copertura per rendere il mondo un posto migliore. Un giorno però riceve un compito particolarmente difficile: dovrà formare una famiglia temporanea e iniziare una nuova vita!
description.kk: Мастер тыңшының кодтық аты<Twilight> өмірін жақсырақ әлем туралы арман үшін жасырын миссияларда өткізді. Бірақ бір күні ол командадан ерекше қиын жаңа бұйрық алады. Миссиясы үшін ол уақытша отбасын құрып, жаңа өмір бастауы керек пе?! Бірегей отбасы туралы тыңшылық/экшн/комедия!
description.pl:
Wyśmienity szpieg, Zmierzch, poświęcił się wykonywaniu tajnych misji z powodu marzeń o lepszym świecie. Ale pewnego dnia otrzymuje bardzo trudne do wykonania zadanie. Aby osiągnąć cel misji, musi założyć tymczasową rodzinę i prowadzić życie najzwyczajniejszego w świecie ojca!  
Oto opowieść o jedynej w swoim rodzaju rodzinie!
description.ru:
Мастерский шпион с кодовым именем <Сумрак> проводит свои дни в закулисных миссиях, всё ради мечты о лучшем мире. Но однажды он получает особенно сложное новое указание от командования. Для этой миссии он обязательно должен завести фиктивную семью и начать новую жизнь! Шпионская экшен-комедия об единственной в своём роде семье!

---
Хитроумный шпион по прозвищу «Сумрак» изо дня в день выполнял секретные миссии, чтобы сделать мир лучше. Однажды он получил очередное трудное задание — ради миссии ему предстоит… обзавестись временной семьёй и начать новую жизнь?! Вас ждёт яркая смесь из шпионского боевика и необычной семейной комедии!
description.th: สุดยอดสปาย "สนธยา" ได้ปฏิบัติการสอดแนมทุกๆวันเพื่อโลกที่ดีกว่า แต่แล้ววันนึงเขาก็ได้รับภารกิจสุดหิน... เพื่อการนั้นเขาจึงได้สร้างครอบครัวปลอมๆและเริ่มชีวิตใหม่!? สปาย x แอคชั่น x คอเมดี้ครอบครัวสุดแนว!
description.uk:
Холоднокровний і геніальний шпигун з кодовим ім'ям «Сутінь» завжди виконував свою роботу чітко і без зайвого шуму. Свою професію він обрав, плекаючи мрії про кращий світ. Він звик до надзвичайно складних завдань, важливість яких мала найвищий рівень, виконуючи які, він наражав своє життя на небезпеку. Але цього разу… Йому була надіслана інформація про нову місію, для успішного виконання якої «Сутінь» повинен завести сім'ю та вдавати відповідального та люблячого батька на ім'я Лоід Фолджер. Так він «удочирив» дівчинку на ім'я Аня. Дівчинка відразу входить у роль «дочки» і радіє кожній миті, яку проводить з новим «батьком». Тепер є тато та донька, але, як же мама? Нею стане неповторна наймана вбивця на ім'я Юрі Бріар (позивний - "Принцеса шипів"). 
Манґа розкриє всі тонкощі та незвичайний життєвий шлях нової «сім'ї», в якій кожен легко може виконати найскладніше завдання, або усунути ціль, але чи зможуть вони виконувати ролі «мами», «тата» та «доньки»?
description.pt-br:
O brilhante espião "Twilight" se dedicava diariamente a cumprir missões secretas por um mundo melhor. Porém, um dia, ele recebeu uma nova tarefa bastante complicada... Para cumprir a sua missão, ele deve formar uma família temporária e começar uma nova vida, mas...?! Uma história de Espiões × Ação × Comédia de uma família bem peculiar!

[ 1° TEMP.(parte 1 e 2) DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 38. ]
description.zh-hk: 技藝高超的間諜<黃昏>，為了更加美好的世界,每天從事著諜報任務。有一天，司令下達了新的難題——…。為了完成任務，所臨時組建的家庭，所展開的新生活，但是！？間諜×打鬥×與眾不同的家族喜劇現在開始！！

title.en: The Great Mage of the Hero’s Party Reincarnates

altTitles.en: The Rebirth of the Hero's Party's Archmage

description.en:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.

altTitles.ja: あくまでクジャクの話です。

altTitles.en: It's just a story about peacocks.

description.en:
Kuji Yakurou is a teacher who was cheated on and dumped by his girlfriend because of his "lack of masculinity". Shouldn't the world be gender-free? He is in anguish, and then Akano, a model, influencer, high achiever, and head of the biology department, appears before him and asks him to be the advisor of the biology department. She then begins to explain why "masculinity" is necessary to be popular after all, using the flamboyant feathers of a peacock as an example of "biology"...! 

This is a biological comedy that confronts you with the brutal truth!
description.es-la:
Kuji Yakurou es un profesor que fue engañado y abandonado por su novia debido a su "falta de masculinidad". ¿No debería el mundo estar libre de género? Está angustiado, y luego Akano, una modelo, influencer, triunfadora y jefa del departamento de biología, aparece ante él y le pide que sea el asesor del departamento de biología. Luego comienza a explicar por qué la "masculinidad" es necesaria para ser popular después de todo, ¡usando las extravagantes plumas de un pavo real como ejemplo de "biología"...!

¡Esta es una comedia biológica que te enfrenta a la brutal verdad!

title.en: When I Returned to My Hometown, My Childhood Friend was Broken

altTitles.ja-ro: Jimoto ni Kaettekitara Osananajimi ga Kowareteta

altTitles.ja: 地元に帰ってきたら幼馴染が壊れてた

altTitles.pt-br: Quando voltei pra minha cidade natal, minha amiga de infância estava falida
Quando voltei pra minha cidade natal, minha amiga de infância estava quebrada

altTitles.tr: Memleketime Döndüğümde Çocukluk Arkadaşım Paramparça Bir Durumdaydı

description.en:
When I was younger, one of my best friends was Kyouko. She was a brash and hotheaded young girl who, even though she was a tomboy, was still loved by her peers. 

To be honest, it’s been a few years since I came back home. The only person I know from there was Kyouko and she seems… different?
description.tr: Gençken en iyi arkadaşlarımdan biri Kyouko'ydu. Cesur ve atılgan bir genç kızdı; tomboy olmasına rağmen, arkadaşları tarafından seviliyordu. Dürüst olmak gerekirse, birkaç yıl sonra eve anca döndüm. Orada tanıdığım tek kişi Kyouko'ydu ve o sanki... biraz değişmişti?
description.pt-br:
Quando eu era mais jovem, uma das minhas melhores amigas era Kyouko. Ela era uma jovem impetuosa e cabeça quente que, embora fosse uma tomboy, ainda era amada por seus colegas.

Para ser sincero, já se passaram alguns anos desde que voltei para casa. A única pessoa que conheço de lá é Kyouko e ela parece... diferente?

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する

altTitles.en: The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge

description.en:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class!?”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja: 「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」 　十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。 　だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。

description.en:
Saki's never been a big fan of mahjong. A lifetime of being forced to play with family at holidays (and losing her money as a consequence...) has left a foul taste for the game in her mouth. When she's convinced, though, to play a game with her classmates, she discovers that not only has fending off her family left her with an uncanny ability for the game but, more surprisingly, that it can even be fun!

Is this revelation enough to cleanse Saki's distaste for the game? Can her classmates convince her to join their club, or is there just too much baggage to make it worth her while?

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらラブコメっぽくなる彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere Ka To Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.es-la: Pensé que era una yandere, pero resultó ser una chica mucho más peligrosa.

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en:
A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.

---

**Notes:**
- There is also a fan colored version and an R18 side(?) story:
description.id: Seorang pria yang tidak lagi bisa menutup mata menyelamatkan seorang gadis yang di-bully oleh teman sekelasnya,tapi sedikit yang dia tahu.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...
description.es-la: Psicópata se enamora de un chico normal.

altTitles.en: Let's Have a Toast With Miso Soup!

description.en:
Zenichirou is a middle school student raised in a motherless family. His breakfast always consists of onigiri and instant miso soup from the convenience store. Yae, a childhood friend of Zenichirou, cannot stand to see him eat such an innutritious breakfast, so she decides to make him breakfast every morning…  
  
This story conveys a simple message: eating with another person makes miso soup taste more delicious and hearty!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ga Kemono ni Naru Mae ni

description.en: Hajime leads an unremarkable life as an undertaker, but he likes his job and has no reason to complain. Nor can he complain of being always called "onii-san" by one of the top star actresses in the country, Kidō Kotone, a childhood friend. Their relationship has always had a touch of awkwardness due to the parents of both having died violent deaths, but nothing could have prepared Hajime - or Japan - to the deed Kotone decides to perpetrate seemingly out of the blue.
From the mangaka of Seeds of Anxiety comes another collection of short horror stories using introspection that will unhinge you… Best for midnight viewing!

One day, a transfer student named Atami suddenly appeared in the countryside. Everyone is curious about the unusual existence of a transfer student.
He injured his leg as a result of the accident and has residual effects.
On the other hand, Kamonomiya, who belongs to the track and field club, is an honest boy who cannot lie.
For some reason, he was the only one who was able to see through Atami's true feelings about how ``disturbing'' the current situation was. This has something to do with their pasts...
A boy whose purpose in life is running and a boy who can no longer run meet and grow into adults...
A story of friendship that runs through youth.

title.en: Yande Kita Mahou Shoujo no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: 病んできた魔法少女の日常

altTitles.id: Keseharian Gadis Penyihir yang Jatuh Sakit

altTitles.en: The Daily Life of a Mentally Ill Magical Girl

description.en: Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!
description.ja: 御城琴音は超がつくお嬢様の高校１年生。駅の券売機の使い方が分からず困っているところを通りがかりの高校１年生・瀬和すぐるに助けられたのをきっかけに、瀬和の高校に転校してきた。はじめての電車。はじめてのカレーうどん。はじめての友達。「はじめてを教えて欲しい」お嬢様と世話焼き男子高校生のはじめてラブコメディ！

description.en: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

title.en: Yuusha-sama, Sakuya mo Otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.ja: 勇者様、昨夜もお楽しみでしたね。

altTitles.ja-ro: Yusha-sama, sakuya mo otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.en: Hero-Sama, I Hope You Had Fun Last Night.
Hero Last Night Was Pumped Wasn’t It?

description.en:
"I did it again...!"

The Hero who can't seem to set out on his journey!!

The protagonist, who was reincarnated into another world, becomes a hero and receives the task of defeating the Demon King. To repay the world that accepted him , he decides to set out on a journey... However, he can't seem to leave the first village, as he is constantly tempted by charming heroines such as the female priestess, his childhood friend who is a magician, and so on!

Thus, the birth of the "I did it again...!" type hero!

altTitles.ja-ro: おっちょこドジおねえさん

description.en:
She may seem like a beautiful, sophisticated woman! But on the inside, she is just a XXX lady. The more she tries to act like an mature adult in front of younger boys, the more twisted and perverted she gets! A popular love-comedy that has received over 300,000 likes on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

description.en:
At the end of the age of shogunates, a great man is given a second chance to restore a crumbling, feudal Japan.  
  
Toward the end of the Edo Period, samurai and visionary Sakamoto Ryouma led a revolutionary movement to overthrow the Takagawa Shogunate. Inspired by the Western principle of "all men created equal", he envisioned a modern Japanese government, free of oppressive feudalism. In 1867, he and his close friend Nakaoka Shintaro were assasinated before his dreams could be realized.  
  
Tenshou no Ryouma explores the historical alternative-universe where Ryouma is saved through Shintaro's sacrifice. Given this second chance, will Ryouma finally be able to establish a new, modern Japan?

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ライジングサン

description.en: Rising Sun will revolve around Tsubasa as he aims to participate in the Olympics as a representative from Japan.

title.en: Gakuen Mono no Otome Game no Sekai ni Tensei Shita kedo, Cheat-mochi no Haikei Danshi Seito datta you desu

altTitles.ja: 学園物の乙女ゲームの世界に転生したけど、チート持ちの背景男子生徒だったようです。

altTitles.zh-hk: 我似乎在學園主題的乙女遊戲世界中轉生，但我是一個有外掛的背景男子學生。

altTitles.en: It Seems that I was Reincarnated into the World of a School Otome Game, but I was a Background Male Student with Cheats.

description.en: Kenta, a freelancer, is reincarnated into a world that resembles a school otome game that his sister likes, and he finds himself a male student with a background character. In his reincarnation, Kenta tries his best to improve his living environment as a commoner, Kent, by making his part-time bakery across the street from his house thrive, but for some reason, more and more attractive women start to appear around him.

Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.
4-koma oneshot collection from Dioxin circle all in one place.
description.ru: Сборник ёнком-ваншотов про тихую и мирную жизнь в Генсокё.
